message.body: I cannot come Wed. Could you ask Brenna? But I will stop by Thursday and check him,probably around 3

Ok, sounds good! I put him on the lunge today and thought he looked a tad better? Lunge line is right in my tack box if you want it Thursday. Foot doesn't feel hot - now I'm wondering if he's just kind of sore from not having a shoe for awhile.
I'll let you know what it seems like to me:) you are probably right
